issue.title: [CF 1124] Steady Focus tracking
issue.body:
What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version) 7.3.2 r1

Hey Cy,

Wondering if you can help me make an icon for my hunter. Steady Focus talent gives a focus regen boost if you cast Cobra Shot twice in a row. However there is no buff for the first Cobra Shot to track.

I'm sure I need a timer, but I'm afraid I am still a little naive on those. I want to be able to show an icon when have cast one Cobra Shot and show an icon warning me to cast another one (since casting another spell, resets the criteria of 2 in a row)

(Laymans: Show icon when Cobra Shot has been cast. Then hide it when Steady Focus is activated from a second Cobra Shot, or hide it if I should cast something else - resetting the 2-count.

Thanks man, appreciate all your work as always!


> Posted by CurseForge user maven1979 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1124 | Raw

comments.body:
You need a counter, not a timer.

Make a combat event icon that triggers when you cast cobra shot. Give it an On Combat Event trigger to increment a counter by 1.

Make a combat event icon that triggers when you cast any of the things that reset it (sorry, you have to collect this list yourself). Set that one's trigger to set the counter to 0.

Make a combat event icon that triggers when you gain SF. Make that one set the counter to 0 as well.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

This was really cool to create and works like a charm - thank you.
